articles.description: The Birthplace Route 66 Festival and Parade returns to downtown Springfield for its 11th year.
articles.content:
SPRINGFIELD, Mo. (KY3) - The Birthplace Route 66 Festival and Parade returns to downtown Springfield for its 11th year.
The festival begins on Thursday at 10 a.m. and goes through Saturday night. Co… [+1730 chars]
